languages.text: "Дальше" — слишком расплывчатое понятие. Когда придет время, я вернусь в Комморру и {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}займу трон архонта{/d} — место, которое принадлежит мне по праву. А пока... пока я остаюсь здесь, подле тебя. Я чую в будущем еще немало крови и страданий, которые мне будет жаль упустить".

"This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."
languages.original_text: "Дальше" — слишком расплывчатое понятие. Когда придет время, я вернусь в Комморру и {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}займу трон архонта{/d} — место, которое принадлежит мне по праву. А пока... пока я остаюсь здесь, подле тебя. Я чую в будущем еще немало крови и страданий, которые мне будет жаль упустить".

traits.locale_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and claim the Archon's throne, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «El concepto de "a continuación" es inútil aquí. Cuando llegue el momento, volveré a Commorragh y {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}me haré con el trono de Arconte{/d}, el lugar que me corresponde por derecho. Pero por ahora... seguiré aquí, a tu lado. Siento que te esperan mucha sangre y sufrimiento y sería una lástima perdérmelo todo».
languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

traits.locale_text: «El concepto de "a continuación" es inútil aquí. Cuando llegue el momento, volveré a Commorragh y me haré con el trono de Arconte, el lugar que me corresponde por derecho. Pero por ahora... seguiré aquí, a tu lado. Siento que te esperan mucha sangre y sufrimiento y sería una lástima perdérmelo todo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “‘接下来’这个概念毫无用处。时机一到，我就回到科摩罗，{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}夺取执政官的宝座{/d}，那个位置属于我。不过现在……我暂时就留在这里吧，留在你身边。我感受到无数鲜血与苦难即将来临，若是错过，那就太可惜了。”
languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

traits.locale_text: “‘接下来’这个概念毫无用处。时机一到，我就回到科摩罗，夺取执政官的宝座，那个位置属于我。不过现在……我暂时就留在这里吧，留在你身边。我感受到无数鲜血与苦难即将来临，若是错过，那就太可惜了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「この『次は』という概念は、ここでは役に立たない。時が来たら、俺はコモラフに戻り、生まれながらの権利である{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}アーコンの王座{/d}を手にするつもりだ。だが、今は…とりあえず今は、お前のそばにいよう。これから大量の血が流れ、苦痛がもたらされる予感がする。そして、それを見逃す手はない」
languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

traits.locale_text: 「この『次は』という概念は、ここでは役に立たない。時が来たら、俺はコモラフに戻り、生まれながらの権利である{d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}アーコンの王座{/d}を手にするつもりだ。だが、今は…とりあえず今は、お前のそばにいよう。これから大量の血が流れ、苦痛がもたらされる予感がする。そして、それを見逃す手はない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ce genre de rêveries n'a pas lieu d'être. Le moment venu, je regagnerai Commorragh et je {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}m'emparerai du trône de l'archonte{/d}, la place qui me revient de droit. Mais pour l'heure... je vais rester ici, à vos côtés. Je sens que votre avenir proche est pavé de sang et de souffrance, et je ne veux surtout pas rater ça. »
languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

traits.locale_text: « Ce genre de rêveries n'a pas lieu d'être. Le moment venu, je regagnerai Commorragh et je m'emparerai du trône de l'archonte, la place qui me revient de droit. Mais pour l'heure... je vais rester ici, à vos côtés. Je sens que votre avenir proche est pavé de sang et de souffrance, et je ne veux surtout pas rater ça. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Solche Überlegungen sind hier nutzlos. Wenn die Zeit kommt, werde ich nach Commorragh zurückkehren und den {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}Thron des Archonten beanspruchen{/d}, den Sitz unmittelbar neben meinem. Doch vorerst ... vorerst bleibe ich hier, an Eurer Seite. Ich spüre viel Blut und Leid kommen – es wäre doch ein Jammer, wenn ich das verpasse."
languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

traits.locale_text: "Solche Überlegungen sind hier nutzlos. Wenn die Zeit kommt, werde ich nach Commorragh zurückkehren und den Thron des Archonten beanspruchen, den Sitz unmittelbar neben meinem. Doch vorerst ... vorerst bleibe ich hier, an Eurer Seite. Ich spüre viel Blut und Leid kommen — es wäre doch ein Jammer, wenn ich das verpasse."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and claim the Archon's throne, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

languages.text: "Sırada diye bir şey yok. Zamanı gelince Commorragh'a dönüp hakkım olanı, {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}Arkonluğu alacağım{/d}. Şimdilik... Burada, yanındayım sanırım. Büyük ızdıraplar, katliamlar seziyorum. Görmezsem çatlarım."
languages.original_text: "This concept of 'next' is useless here. When the time comes, I will return to Commorragh and {d|Encyclopedia:CompMarazhai_Archont}claim the Archon's throne{/d}, the seat that is mine by right. But for now... for now I will remain here, by your side. I sense much blood and suffering to come — it would be a shame for me to miss it."

traits.locale_text: "Sırada diye bir şey yok. Zamanı gelince Commorragh'a dönüp hakkım olanı, Arkon'luğu alacağım. Şimdilik... Burada, yanındayım sanırım. Büyük ızdıraplar, katliamlar seziyorum. Görmezsem çatlarım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
